title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 511-2.15 - Local Planning
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 511-2.15 - Local Planning

State Regulations

The provider of service shall participate as required with
the local governmental unit in local planning processes pursuant to sections
41.05
and
41.16
of
the Mental Hygiene Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
511-2.15

Adopted

New

York State Register July 17, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 29, eff. 7/17/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
